title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: School Library Services for Students with Dyslexia in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Basic reading education theory and library management experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Understand the learning characteristics of students with dyslexia and analyze service elements based on the LAFE framework
Design personalized reading support strategies utilizing digital technology by applying the 5E instructional model
Develop and evaluate smartphone-based information literacy educational materials within resource-constrained environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
